summary: Strategy Idea Detail flow testing complete. All 9 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified all components working: View button navigation, script auto-generation with Hinglish style, Regenerate Script, Copy button, Create Submission, Create AI Video Task, and Back button navigation.
passed_tests: GET /api/fvs/ideas/{idea_id} - returns correct idea with all fields (topic, hypothesis, format, convictionScore, status)
POST /api/fvs/ideas/{idea_id}/generate-script - generates script with Channel Profile settings
POST /api/fvs/ideas/{idea_id}/generate-script - uses Hinglish style from Channel Profile (languageStyle='hinglish')
POST /api/submissions - creates submission from idea detail page
POST /api/video-tasks - creates AI video task from idea detail page
GET /api/fvs/ideas - returns list of all ideas
GET /api/fvs/ideas?status=proposed - returns filtered ideas by status
Frontend: View button on FVS System page navigates to /dashboard/strategy/idea/:ideaId
Frontend: Strategy Idea Detail page loads with three-panel UI (Idea Overview, Generated Script, Actions)
Frontend: Script auto-generates on page load using Channel Profile (Hinglish style)
Frontend: Create Submission button creates submission and shows inline 'View in Submissions' link
Frontend: Create AI Video Task button creates video task and shows inline 'View in AI Video Lab' link
Frontend: Back button navigates back to FVS System page
critical_code_review_comments: Script generation correctly uses Anthropic Claude via Emergent LLM Key with Channel Profile settings
Hinglish style script contains proper mix of Hindi and English (e.g., 'Podcast bana ke bhool jate ho?', 'Bahut bada mistake hai bhai')
Action buttons correctly disabled while script is generating
Inline links appear after successful creation (View in Submissions, View in AI Video Lab)
User stays on page after creating submission/video task as specified
seed_data_creation: None - used existing proposed ideas from FVS System
